member.name: M:DELETE_WINDOW(Synergex.SynergyDE.i)
member.param: ID of the Window to be deleted

member.name: M:input(Synergex.SynergyDE.n,Synergex.SynergyDE.n,Synergex.SynergyDE.n,Synergex.SynergyDE.n,Synergex.SynergyDE.n,Synergex.SynergyDE.n,Synergex.SynergyDE.n)
member.summary: Performs keyboard input from a Synergy Window
member.param: ID of the winodw to perform input on
Window row for location of input
Window column for location of input
Field to enter data into
Pass 1 to indicate the field is required
Pass 1 to indicate that negative values are ok in a numeric field
Pass 1 to indicate that the field is a date (enter MMDDYYYY, stored as YYYYMMDD)

member.name: M:CREATE_WINDOW(Synergex.SynergyDE.i,Synergex.SynergyDE.a,Synergex.SynergyDE.n,Synergex.SynergyDE.n,Synergex.SynergyDE.n,Synergex.SynergyDE.n,Synergex.SynergyDE.a)
member.param: Returned ID of the created window
Name of window to create
Height of window
Width of window
Screen row for window placement
Screen column for window placement
Optional title for window

member.name: M:file_access(FileOp,Synergex.SynergyDE.n,Synergex.SynergyDE.a,Synergex.SynergyDE.n)
member.summary: General purpose utility routine to read and write ISAM files.
member.param: Operation mode. Pass a member of the FileOp enumeration.
Channel number of file to be accessed.
Record area containing data to be written (for Create or Update) or to contain data read (for Read or ReadNext).
Key value to read (for Read or Find).
member.returns: Returns a member of the FileResult enumeration. FileResult.OK indicates sucessful completion, other values indicate an error condition.

member.name: M:WAIT_KEY(Synergex.SynergyDE.i,Synergex.SynergyDE.n,Synergex.SynergyDE.n,Synergex.SynergyDE.a)
member.summary: Accepts a single key stroke at a specified position in a specified Synergy window, returns key pressed to the calling routine
member.param: Window ID of the window to be used for input
Row position where input should take place
Column position where input should take place
Key pressed (returned to calling routine)

member.name: M:DISPLAY_TEXT(Synergex.SynergyDE.i,Synergex.SynergyDE.n,Synergex.SynergyDE.n,Synergex.SynergyDE.a)
member.summary: Displays Text in a Synergy Window
member.param: ID of the window to display text on
Window row to display text at
Window column to display text at
Text to be displayed

member.name: M:CLEAR_BOX(Synergex.SynergyDE.i,Synergex.SynergyDE.d,Synergex.SynergyDE.d,Synergex.SynergyDE.d,Synergex.SynergyDE.d)
member.param: Window ID
Row to clear from
Column to clear from
Row to clear to
Column to clear to
